snippet: The N.C.A.A. on Tuesday cited the university for “a lack of institutional control” over its athletics programs.
abstract: NCAA penalizes Texas Southern for lack of control over its athletics programs, laying a list of violations that includes 129 athletes in 13 sports competing while ineligible over seven years.
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. on Tuesday cited the university for “a lack of institutional control” over its athletics programs.

headline.seo: N.C.A.A. Cites Texas Southern for Violations in 13 Sports
headline.main: Texas Southern Is Penalized By the N.C.A.A.
headline.print_headline: Texas Southern Is Penalized By the N.C.A.A.
